title: Warhammer Proficiency
content:
Warhammer Proficiency Effect Add your proficiency bonus to attack rolls (your chance to hit a target) with warhammers. Requirements Dwarf

Warhammer Proficiency

Add your proficiency bonus to attack rolls (your chance to hit a target) with warhammers.

Warhammer Proficiency is a Feature in Baldur's Gate 3. Features provide unique abilities or effects and can be acquired depending on the Character's Race, Class and level.
